title: Learning to Trust: Full Submission
description: Marisa's haunted by her first real encounter with billionaire Roland Starland, an encounter so passionate that it threatened to turn her world upside down. The only problem is, he's just getting started. For Marisa, the assignment continues to grow more and more taxing; every time she digs into Roland's controversial past, he takes her further into her own mind, uncovering secret desires and revealing his sexy plans for her.Marisa is not sure how to proceed. If she fully submits, she's lost control, a mistake that could compromise her career. But with a powerful billionaire like Roland, can she ever truly be in control? Some risks are just worth taking.This is the second book in the series "Interviewing the Billionaire" by one of the hottest new voices in erotica, B.B. Roman! This story is 10000 words long and contains adult content.
author: B.B. Roman
